9d930ded-a29f-4701-bc0a-1d68e3c0df58.description: NSITE partners with Powersim Solutions to offer coursework and provide a simulated business environment for the development of essential business skills. By taking a comprehensive view of the organization's operations, earners understand how decisions and actions impact the business as a whole and work effectively and collaboratively as team members. Earners have successfully developed and executed a business strategy, analyzed markets, competitors, customers, and performance.
9d930ded-a29f-4701-bc0a-1d68e3c0df58.name: Business Essentials

alignments.name: NSITE Mission
alignments.description: NSITE provides a customized Business Essentials Program as part of our Business Leaders Program (BLP) for individuals who are blind and low-vision to deepen their understanding of business processes and prepare them for career advancement. NSITE partners with Powersim Solutions for the business simulation component of the program.

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of two online courses - Finance and Budgeting Essentials and Improving Decision Making - that require online coursework, reading, watching videos, and taking a test.

Attended eight scheduled conference calls lasting approximately one hour. Calls included discussions of results and team decision-making activities. Facilitators also led discussions on selected topics pertaining to marketing, financial analysis, team decision-making, and leadership.

Pass assessment indicating successful completion of course work and achievement of learning outcomes. Assessment consists of a written test, successful implementation of strategy, presentations of simulation strategy, simulation performance outcomes, and team decision-making processes.

64b67617-f50e-46b5-97d2-6c954d5db25f.description: NSITE’s Professional Mastery of Office Technology for Employment (ProMOTE) training program provides advanced training to assistive technology (AT) users who are blind or have low vision. NSITE delivers ProMOTE training through a cadre of specialized facilitators who have successfully completed the 5-day ProMOTE Train-the-Trainer course that includes knowledge checks and observed mock facilitation sessions.
64b67617-f50e-46b5-97d2-6c954d5db25f.name: NSITE ProMOTE Train-the-Trainer Course Completion

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a 5-day virtual course that trains future ProMOTE trainers on how to instruct blind and visually impaired users of assistive technologies in the proficient use of office technologies.
Pass intermediate knowledge checks after course segments and complete mock facilitation sessions that include observation and expert feedback.

skills.name: Computer Skills Training for Blind Learners

2de24590-417f-44c7-bfde-87101f3075cb.description: NSITE offers the United States’ first Cisco Networking Academy adapted to the learning styles of people who are blind or low-vision. The NSITE Cisco Networking Academy provides foundational knowledge of a broad range of IT fundamentals, preparing participants to pass the Cisco Certified Network Associates (CCNA) exam and take their IT careers in any direction they wish.
2de24590-417f-44c7-bfde-87101f3075cb.name: NSITE CISCO Networking Academy

alignments.name: NSITE Mission
alignments.description: The NSITE Cisco Networking Academy provides foundational knowledge of a broad range of IT fundamentals to individuals who are blind or low-vision. Program graduates are prepared to pass the Cisco Certified Network Associates (CCNA) Exam to become Cisco Certified Network Associates, a certification recognized throughout the IT industry.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 40-week virtual instructor-led training program divided into three learning blocks; classes are held during two 3-hour sessions each week. In addition, students study and complete lab assignments on their own time.

Passed three Intermediate Exams at the end of each of the three course segments, approx. after weeks 12, 24, and 40, indicating successful completion of course and lab work and achievement of learning outcomes. Assessment consists of a written tests and submission of successfully completed lab assignments.

babf74d4-8e70-444c-94f1-d54cf65e2665.description: Earners of the NSITE Sourcing Specialist badge have developed the skills to effectively use recruiting/sourcing online platforms and apply principles of the Universal Search Method in a sourcing and recruiting environment. They are competent in skills such as building Boolean search strings applicable to multiple databases, tailoring outreach messages to specific candidate types, connecting effectively with passive candidates, and more.
babf74d4-8e70-444c-94f1-d54cf65e2665.name: Sourcing Specialist

alignments.name: NSITE Mission
alignments.description: NSITE provides a customized Sourcing Specialist Certificate Program for individuals who are blind or visually impaired to prepare them for a career in candidate sourcing and recruitment. NSITE partners with Orion Global Talent and Social Talent for the online and classroom components and with Bristol Myers Squibb for the work experience.

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 12-week program consisting of weekly 1-hour-long group sessions and 5-6 hours of self-paced course and lab work including knowledge checks and self-study.

Successful completion of 6-week Work Experience to ensure knowledge transfer and application of learned candidate sourcing and selection skills from classroom to corporate talent acquisition environment with a health industry partner.

fb8989af-81eb-49c1-bac6-fe4e8ae1c6fc.description: Earners of the NSITE Sourcing Specialist badge have developed the skills to effectively use recruiting/sourcing online platforms and apply principles of the Universal Search Method in a sourcing and recruiting environment. They are competent in skills such as building Boolean search strings applicable to multiple databases, tailoring outreach messages to specific candidate types, connecting effectively with passive candidates, and more.
fb8989af-81eb-49c1-bac6-fe4e8ae1c6fc.name: Sourcing Specialist 2023

alignments.name: NSITE Mission
alignments.description: NSITE provides a customized Sourcing Specialist Certificate Program for individuals who are blind and visually impaired to prepare them for a career in sourcing and recruitment. NSITE partners with Social Talent for the online learning component and with Bristol Myers Squibb for the work experience.

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 12-week program consisting of weekly 1-hour-long group sessions and 5-6 hours of self-paced course and lab work including knowledge checks and self-study.

Successful completion of 6-week Work Experience on a corporate talent acquisition team to ensure knowledge transfer of learned candidate sourcing and selection skills from classroom to corporate recruiting environment and practical application of skills through work with a health industry partner.

6a9cae7a-f270-49ed-9950-ec8145d53ba1.description: NSITE partners with Baker Communications Inc. (BCI) to offer a workshop adapted for blind and low-vision learners that builds key sales and customer communications skills. Part of NSITE’s Career Skills Training Programs, the workshop is delivered virtually in 4-hour sessions over four consecutive days and covers topics such as Pre-Engagement Research, Making Contact, Calibrating the Conversation, Discovering Needs, Navigating Customer Objections and Fears, and Presenting the Solution.
6a9cae7a-f270-49ed-9950-ec8145d53ba1.name: NSITE Customer-Centered Communications

alignments.name: NSITE Customer-Centered Communications
alignments.description: NSITE has partnered with Baker Communications Inc. (BCI), recognized as one of the leading sales training providers, to offer a workshop that builds key sales and customer communications skills and has been adapted to accommodate the learning styles of blind and low-vision learners and prepares them for careers in Customer Service or Sales.

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of highly participatory virtual 4-hour workshop sessions on four consecutive days. Active engagement during virtual instructor-led group meetings, completion of workbook assignments, presentation of sample customer interactions, giving and receiving constructive feedback, and integration of feedback into new and improved iterations of customer communication presentations.

ed720159-e0e6-4013-86b3-84fead53dc3e.description: The NSITE Master Facilitator badge for ProMOTE Train-the-Trainer Instruction is an award issued in recognition of years of commitment and invaluable contributions to making learning accessible to blind visually impaired (bvi) learners. The ProMOTE Master Facilitator instructs aspiring ProMOTE trainers in curriculum delivery centered around building proficiency in the use of office technology through the use of assistive technologies to bvi audiences.
ed720159-e0e6-4013-86b3-84fead53dc3e.name: NSITE Master Facilitator: ProMOTE Train-the-Trainer

alignments.name: NSITE Mission and Vision
alignments.description: The NSITE Master Facilitator: ProMOTE Train-the-Trainers equips a cadre of new instructors with specialized skills to take users of assistive technologies through the most common computer related office tasks, thereby enabling blind and visually impaired professionals to pursue opportunities for career advancement.

badge_template_activities.title: Leading the development and implementation of innovative programming to benefit the blind and low-vision professional community.

Multiple years of professional experience in the development, continuous improvement, and implementation of ProMOTE Train-the-Trainer Curricula to meet the needs of future trainers of blind and low-vision learners.
Delivery of best-in-class accessible training programs to future ProMOTE Trainers, preparing them to deliver training to blind and low-vision audiences.

skills.name: Computer Skills Training for Blind Learners

85e5e3b7-f160-403d-b5ab-3023636b8e90.description: NSITE’s Professional Mastery of Office Technology for Employment (ProMOTE) training program provides advanced office technology training to assistive technology (AT) users who are blind or have low vision. Earners of this badge have successfully completed the intensive 4-week ProMOTE training program that includes knowledge checks and practical application of learned skills to project-based, time sensitive tasks that mirror what they will find in the workplace.
85e5e3b7-f160-403d-b5ab-3023636b8e90.name: NSITE ProMOTE Course Completion

alignments.name: NSITE ProMOTE Course Completion
alignments.description: Successful completion of 4-week ProMOTE program to master Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint, internet browsing, creating accessible documents, troubleshooting, and applying these skills to project-based, time sensitive tasks that mirror what they will find in the workplace. Must complete and pass knowledge checks.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed a 4-week virtual course that provides advanced office technology skills training to blind or low-vision users of assistive technologies (AT) in fundamental skills with AT, Microsoft Office Suite of products, troubleshooting, internet browsing and applying these skills to project-based, time sensitive tasks. Coursework includes knowledge checks.

a4e5fe46-6cbd-4c74-9a0d-9549502d42c6.description: Earners of the NSITE Sourcing Specialist badge have developed the skills to effectively use recruiting/sourcing online platforms and apply principles of the Universal Search Method in a sourcing and recruiting environment. They are competent in skills such as building Boolean search strings applicable to multiple databases, tailoring outreach messages to specific candidate types, connecting effectively with passive candidates, and more.
a4e5fe46-6cbd-4c74-9a0d-9549502d42c6.name: Test Badge for Demo

alignments.name: NSITE Mission
alignments.description: NSITE provides a customized Sourcing Specialist Certificate Program for individuals who are blind or visually impaired to prepare them for a career in candidate sourcing and recruitment. NSITE partners with Orion Global Talent and Social Talent for the online and classroom components and with Bristol Myers Squibb for the work experience.

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 12-week program consisting of weekly 1-hour-long group sessions and 5-6 hours of self-paced course and lab work including knowledge checks and self-study.

Successful completion of 6-week Work Experience to ensure knowledge transfer and application of learned candidate sourcing and selection skills from classroom to corporate talent acquisition environment with a health industry partner.
